array.param: Strength of positional movement (how far the whole position can change in X,Y&Z), should not be bigger than .1, or the camera might move into, or behind, the player
Strength of vertical camera pan (up/down), practical range: 0-10
Strength of horizontal camera pan (left/right), practical range: 0-10
Strength of camera tilt/bank, practical range: 0-20
If true, then transitions in the different shaking directions will be smoother
